title: Understanding Telehealth
text: Telehealth involves the use of technology to provide healthcare services remotely. It allows healthcare providers to connect with patients who are not physically present in the same location.

hintAnswer: $$health-care$$ providers use digital technologies to deliver medical care, health education, and public health services by remotely connecting multiple users in separate locations
title: Components of Telehealth
text: What are the key components involved in telehealth services?
choices: $$health-care$$ providers use digital technologies to deliver medical care, health education, and public health services by remotely connecting multiple users in separate locations
health insurance provides communicate with patients online
